```{css, echo = FALSE}

  max-width: 250px;
  /*white-space: nowrap;*/  /*quand c'est activé, empêche line break longs titres*/

  font-weight: bold; /*gras*/
  margin-left: -1%;
  border: #323465;

}
#TOC:before { /*marge avant premier titre de la TOC*/
  content: "";
  display: block;
  padding-top: 5%;
  background: #323465; /* background with same color */
  border: #323465;
}
#TOC:after { /*marge après dernier titre de la TOC*/
  content: "";
  display: block;
  padding-top: 5%;
  background: #323465; /* background with same color */
  border: #323465;
}
.sidenote, .marginnote { 
  float: left;
  clear: left;
  margin-left: -27%; 
  margin-right: -40%;
  margin-top: -70px; /*vertical alignement*/
  position: relative;
}
.sidenote2, .marginnote2 { 
  float: left;
  clear: left;
  width: 7%;
  margin-left: 0%; 
  margin-right: -40%;
  margin-top: 38px; /*vertical alignement*/

}
.sidenote3, .marginnote3 { 
  float: left;
  clear: left;

  margin-right: -40%;

}
```
